dynamic_line: I've been listening to those things eat the others they've brought back to here.
Can you get me out of this spider pit?
Who are you?  Are you real?
Can you please save me?  I have to get out of here.
I can't believe my eyes.  Thank you, thank you!

responses.text: Let's get out of here before more spiders show up.
I don't need another mouth to feed.  Get out of my sight.
